verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came again unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against the Ammonites <WH1121>, and prophesy against them <WH5012>;

And say <WH559> unto the Ammonites <WH1121>, Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because you said <WH559>, Aha <WH1889>, against my sanctuary <WH4720>, when it was profaned <WH2490>; and against the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>, when it was desolate <WH8074>; and against the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063>, when they went <WH1980> into captivity <WH1473>;

Behold <WH5414>, therefore I will deliver you to the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> for a possession <WH4181>, and they shall set <WH3427> their palaces <WH2918> in you <WH5414>, and make their dwellings <WH4908> in you <WH398>: they shall eat your fruit <WH6529>, and they shall drink <WH8354> your milk <WH2461>.

And I will make <WH5414> Rabbah <WH7237> a stable <WH5116> for camels <WH1581>, and the Ammonites <WH1121> a restingplace <WH4769> for flocks <WH6629>: and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because you have clapped <WH4222> your hands <WH3027>, and stamped <WH7554> with the feet <WH7272>, and rejoiced <WH8055> in heart <WH5315> with all your despite <WH7589> against the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>;

Behold <WH5186>, therefore I will stretch out my hand <WH3027> upon you <WH5414>, and will deliver you for a plunder <WH957> to the heathen <WH1471>; and I will cut you off <WH3772> from the people <WH5971>, and I will cause you to perish <WH6> out of the countries <WH776>: I will destroy <WH8045> you <WH3045>; and you shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because <WH3282> that Moab <WH4124> and Seir <WH8165> do say <WH559>, Behold <WH1004>, the house of Judah <WH3063> is like unto all the heathen <WH1471>;

Therefore <WH6605>, behold, I will open the side <WH3802> of Moab <WH4124> from the cities <WH5892>, from his cities <WH5892> which are on his frontiers <WH7097>, the glory <WH6643> of the country <WH776>, Beth <WH1020>–jeshimoth, Baal <WH1186>–meon, and Kiriathaim <WH7156>,

Unto the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> with the Ammonites <WH1121>, and will give <WH5414> them in possession <WH4181>, that the Ammonites <WH1121> may not be remembered <WH2142> among the nations <WH1471>.
And I will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> upon Moab <WH4124>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because that Edom <WH123> has dealt <WH6213> against the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> by taking <WH5358> vengeance <WH5359>, and has greatly <WH816> offended <WH816>, and revenged himself upon them <WH5358>;

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; I will also stretch out <WH5186> my hand <WH3027> upon Edom <WH123>, and will cut off <WH3772> man <WH120> and animal <WH929> from it <WH5414>; and I will make it desolate <WH2723> from Teman <WH8487>; and they of Dedan <WH1719> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>.

And I will lay <WH5414> my vengeance <WH5360> upon Edom <WH123> by the hand <WH3027> of my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>: and they shall do <WH6213> in Edom <WH123> according to my anger <WH639> and according to my fury <WH2534>; and they shall know <WH3045> my vengeance <WH5360>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because the Philistines <WH6430> have dealt <WH6213> by revenge <WH5360>, and have taken <WH5358> vengeance <WH5359> with a despiteful <WH7589> heart <WH5315>, to destroy <WH4889> it for the old <WH5769> hatred <WH342>;

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Behold <WH5186>, I will stretch out my hand <WH3027> upon the Philistines <WH6430>, and I will cut off <WH3772> the Cherethims <WH3774>, and destroy <WH6> the remnant <WH7611> of the sea <WH3220> coast <WH2348>.

And I will execute <WH6213> great <WH1419> vengeance <WH5360> upon them with furious <WH2534> rebukes <WH8433>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>, when I shall lay <WH5414> my vengeance upon them <WH5360>.
